ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Trust has been working for the Comprehensive development of persons with Disabilities(PWDs) and implementing Community Based Rehabilitation(CBR) for the last 10 years in 8 mandals of Mahabubnagar District of Andhra Pradesh. The guiding principles of our work are ownership by the PWDs, convergence, compliance with national and international conventions and statutory provisions, livelihood development. The key interventions are 1. Social mobilisation- formation and nurturing of SHGs and their federations 2. capacity building of all stakeholders including government officials and representatives of local Bodies 3. Rehabilitation services under CBR mode 4. Livelihood development 5. Facilitating inclusive policies and programs. Thus we facilitated formation of 305 Self Help Groups and federated them at mandal level. We facilitated rehabilitation services to 6550 people with deisabilities under CBR program. These 8 mandal federations are managing 8 neighbourhood centres for providng CBR services. One special school for the children with Mental retardation and severe disabilities is run by the federations with finacial support from the Government under Rajiv Vidya Mission. We facilitated accessing of Rs. 54.87 lakhs by federations from Government which they use as revolving fund and rotate among themselves for funding their livelihood activities. This is called Community Initiative Fund(CIF) and totally managed by the federations. They could also access Rs. 11.73 lakhs from Commercial Banks as loan for their livelihood activities.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: HANDS has been conducted many Development actitivities in rural areas as follows; 1.Natural forest Regeneration program, 2. Sustainable agriculture, 3.Women and Children development, and 4. HIV prevention program. We have been protecting 10,000 acres of forest creenery under Natural Forest Regeneration program. Under Agriculture programs we are providing seed for 50,000 acres. 500 landless women have got 900 acres assignment land under land distribution program by the Govt. of AP. Protecting children from their issues by the support of 1098 toll free number. 2560 HRGs have been protecting from the sexual diseases under HIV prevention program. These are the major Activities and Achievements.

ngoList.address: Icha Foundation, 501 Geetanjali Apartments2, Kirlampudi Layout, Beach Road, Visakhapatnam-530017
ngoList.title: Icha Foundation
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Registered Trust Deed in 2010  Icha Foundation adopted 5 mentally and physically challenged orphan and abandoned kids  Established a campus of 1 acres in village kondakurla around 54 kms from Visakhapatnam. Funds were raised from family and well-wishers and friends.  Shifted the Foundation to the Campus and added one more specially abled child from the nearby village of Kondakurla.  Built and established rapport with the Village and community and leaders in village Kondakurla  Got Foreign Contribution Regulation Act (FCRA)  Installed Solar Power Renewable for the Total Campus needs  Built and established a Physiotherapy Centre with a running facility and in-house Physiotherapist working full time for Icha Foundation for all the kids  Facilities like speech therapy introduced in 2014  Built and expanded the staff and children of the Icha Foundation within 5 years from 3 to 15 mentally and physically challenged orphan kids.  Severe Physical destruction of the campus during Hud-Hud and funds were raised for repair and rework.  Nearby donation of 1 acre land by Spanish sponsor in 2015 for establishment of a school with integrated rural children and children with severe disability.  Focus on building self-sustaining campus with investment in cows and livestock for food and milk requirement.  Awareness and medical camps two being organised in 2015 and 2016 in which nearby villages rural communities and children came around 700. This was a joint collaboration between Icha Foundation and Indian Navy  Fund raising event organised in Visakhapatnam in collaboration with razzmatazz event management company  Present donors are Feel Well garments, Flash Forge, Affiliation with kind from NAWA and Indian Navy.
